results.title: I'm not French
results.creator_credit: Alain Herz, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Alain Herz examines his ethnicity, tracing it back to his parents Jewish/Polish background, his upbringing in Belgium and his eventual migration from France to Australia. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Jewish Museum of Australia.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Alain Herz, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Alain Herz examines his ethnicity, tracing it back to his parents Jewish/Polish background, his upbringing in Belgium and his eventual migration from France to Australia. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Jewish Museum of Australia.

results.title: A Fishy problem
results.creator_credit: Astrid Silberman, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Astrid Silberman attempts to recreate her family recipe for Gefilte fish. She has trouble deciding whether to follow the traditional recipe or to come up with a new interpretation on the old tradition. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Jewish Museum of Australia.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Astrid Silberman, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Stories from Gippsland : Digital Storytelling project
results.creator_credit: Lyn Skillern, Bridget Nicholson, Zephlyn Neilsen, Shirlee McPherson, Lyn Johnson, Graham Goulding, Vivianne Everett, Ruth Burleigh, Rowena Ashley, ACMI and ACMI Digital Storytelling
results.brief_description: Nine members of the Gippsland community tell of the things dearest to them : whether they be close friends, life changing experiences, treasured animals or inspirational family members. These things and people have all served the participants in providing them with a sense of home.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Lyn Skillern, Bridget Nicholson, Zephlyn Neilsen, Shirlee McPherson, Lyn Johnson, Graham Goulding, Vivianne Everett, Ruth Burleigh, Rowena Ashley, ACMI and ACMI Digital Storytelling

results.title: Yellow gloves
results.creator_credit: Lyn Johnson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Originally a city girl, Lyn Johnson wondered if she was cut out to be a farmers wife but a pair of yellow gloves changed everything. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Arts Victoria and the Community Support Fund.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Lyn Johnson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Without a doubt
results.creator_credit: Lyn Skillern, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: John Rouse, a kind and fun loving man from Yorkshire loved to dress as Santa and even had his own catch phrase, ‘without a doubt’. His daughter-in-law Lyn Skillern and her family remember and pay tribute to him.

results.title: That dreaded phone call
results.creator_credit: Ruth Burleigh, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Ruth Burleigh reflects on the day she’ll have to make that dreaded call and put her beloved horse Boris ‘out to pasture’. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Arts Victoria and the Community Support Fund.

results.title: My car : my place
results.creator_credit: Bridget Nicholson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Bridget Nicholson’s car represents many things to her. More than a way to get from A to B, her car is a private place, a safe place and has intensified the freedom of travel. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Arts Victoria and the Community Support Fund.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Bridget Nicholson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Bridget Nicholson’s car represents many things to her. More than a way to get from A to B, her car is a private place, a safe place and has intensified the freedom of travel. results.title: A Mission from Dog
results.creator_credit: Shirlee McPherson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Like Shirlee McPherson, her partner Dennis has always loved dogs, which led them to rescuing a neglected border collie and her litter of pups.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Shirlee McPherson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Like Shirlee McPherson, her partner Dennis has always loved dogs, which led them to rescuing a neglected border collie and her litter of pups.
